description:
A crane repays a debt. A lazy woman is visited by terrible ghosts. A monster and a mountain granny terrorize a village.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Crane Repays a Debt / Chinchin Kobakama / The Monster and the Mountain Granny
Tsuru no Ongaeshi / Chinchin Kobakama / Bakemono to Yamanba
鶴の恩返し / ちんちん小袴 / 化けものと山んば
